name: Trial Ending Soon
subject: Your Trial for {{ doc.company_name }} is Ending Soon
response:
Your Free Trial is Ending Soon

Hello {{ doc.admin_name }},

This is a reminder that your free trial for {{ doc.company_name }} is scheduled to end in 7 days.

To ensure uninterrupted access to all features, please log in and upgrade to a paid plan.

If no action is taken, your account will be automatically switched to our free plan at the end of the trial period.


Thank you,

The ROKCT.ai Team
